review: stayed here for 3 days and it was one of the best experince i had in a hotel. they have great hospitality. the view is also very beautiful and the sunset view is amazing. food is also good and there is enough space inside to park your vehicle.
name: Storyteller820752

review: This is a average hotel,location is far away from the center of the city.It is for those tourist who want a to stay away from the crowded Pithoragah city for a night .Surrounding are good. Rooms are average, how ever the size is very big.Breakfast was very good .
name: rasty
